aboutmeinfo: I am a passionate frontend developer from near Kempten in the Allg√§u. Enthusiastic about the endless possibilities of IT, I create user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing websites as well as applications that are optimized for smooth use.
aboutmeinfo1: My focus is on creating user-friendly websites and projects that impress with technical excellence and well-structured code. I see every new task as an opportunity to expand my knowledge and develop innovative approaches.
aboutmeinfo2: I see programming as a hike in the mountains: with a clear goal in mind, the path can sometimes be challenging, but the view from the summit - the result achieved - is priceless. Every difficulty is a rock that I overcome, and it is precisely this creative process that spurs me on again and again.
skillsinfo: I have gained experience in building projects with various frontend technologies and concepts.
portolioinfo: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
joininfo: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
sharkieinfo: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
contactinfo1: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
contactinfo2: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
